Hello,

I have a server available at Dacentec which I do not need anymore. Here are the specs for the same:

Build - HP

Processor - 2xL5420

RAM - 16 GB

HardDrive - 1 x 1 TB

Price: $99

Mode of Payment: Credit/Debit Card or Bitcoins(additional $5 off).

Cheers! :)
